title: THE DESCENT (2005) Ending & Alternate Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: Thought I'd do something totally different and do a video on an older movie. One of my fav horrors! Gimme a shout if you'd like me to do older movies. I'm open to suggestions too!
I prefer the UK ending. Not all endings are meant to be happy.
The UK ending is better, especially since it would nullify the horrible sequel.

I only ever knew the UK ending, Its so more hard hitting than the US edit for sure! Although dark, the UK ending  shows Sarah's surrender and peace, without it, the US edit just leaves you deflated with a mild jump scare.
you and foundflix are my favorite ending explained channels! i like the depth that you go into but it isn't ever too much or boring! keep up the good work !
description:
We go way back to review one of the endings to a horror classic, Neil Marshall's "The Descent". Theories, analysis, and breakdown of both the US and UK theatrical versions.
